text:
When you're fully #vaccinated, you lower the likelihood of you AND others getting #COVID19. Even if you catch the #coronavirus, the #vaccine means much milder symptoms and long-term effects (if any). Plus you're FAR less likely to spread it around.⛔☣️

#VaccinesWork, folks. 💉✅ https://t.co/DeGqJ0kaBO https://t.co/h8g98AXBV7
